name: LudumDare 34 Dashing Cubes
description:
This is my entry for LudumDare 34. I made it in around 5 hours so it's a bit rough and has no sound. But I Hope you enjoy. Also when I saw the theme I thought it said "one button controls". Also I don't know if the Linux or Mac builds work so if they don't, I'm sorry.

Controls:

Space - Switch

Esc - return to menu

R- Reset
